https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/x5A0RdsKe8qnX9ntPXL4dsPGvMl.jpg A woman stuck in a stale marriage struggles to raise her children and manage her secret drug habit. But when winter comes to her small town, her balancing act begins to come crashing down. Down to the Bone
